SELECT SUM(TC.MILEAGE) AS TOTAL_MILEAGE FROM SETTLEMENT ST LEFT JOIN EMP_CUSTOMER EC ON EC.CO_CODE = ST.CO_CODE AND EC.BIZ_NO = ST.CUST_ID AND EC.EMP_ID = ST.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTOMER TC ON ST.CO_CODE = TC.CO_CODE AND ST.CUST_ID = TC.BIZ_NO WHERE ST.CO_CODE = #{loginCoId} AND ST.REFUND_IND IS NULL AND ST.REQ_DATE BETWEEN #{searchStartDate} AND #{searchEndDate} AND ST.REQ_GUBUN = 'AQ'
AND ST.USER_ID = #{loginUserId}
